title: a practical use for McD's fry grease
body: <!-- id=118--><!-- isMature=0 --><A HREF="http://biodiesel.grassroots.com/backersregistration/">Sign up here</A> to be a part of the BioDiesel movement.  It is painless, spam-free, and takes less than a minute.  Most diesel vehicles can run on BioDiesel with little or no modifications.  Not only does the exhaust smell like french fries, but its good for the environment.
